title: Orangutan Teacher
description:
Guy Raz is nervous about teaching his "Faster-Class," so Mindy is taking him to the best teacher on Earth... an orangutan?! Learn with Guy and Mindy about how these creatures teach their offspring how to forage for food. It's the who, when, how, and WOW of orangutans.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
